name: Purgers of the Crystal Watchers
description:
Purgers of the Crystal Watchers is a game made by Team Triple Flip(team 13). A project group working on their last game of the second year Games & Interaction Bachelor!

What is it About?
The game is a cooperative, melee, skill based boss fighter that tries to reinvent boss fights in a way never seen before. You as the player get to choose how the boss behaves and where you fight it. The player also has the ability to use portals and magic to increase their chances of winning against such a large threat.
